pkgmetadata.longdescription: Ecological Inference by Linear Programming under Homogeneity // Provides a bunch of algorithms based on linear programming for estimating, under the homogeneity hypothesis, RxC ecological contingency tables (or vote transition matrices) using exclusively aggregate data (from voting units). References: Romero, Pava, Martn and Romero (2020) doi:10.1080/02664763.2020.1804842. Pava and Romero (2021a) doi:10.31124/advance.14716638.v1. Pava and Romero (2021b) Symmetry estimating RC vote transfer matrices from aggregate data.
